data.name: Agent Coulson
data.description: An agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. who defends the Helicarrier by clearing positive effects from invading teams.

starItems.name: Agent Coulson
starItems.description: An agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. who defends the Helicarrier by clearing positive effects from invading teams.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage. 

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to reduce Speed Bar of primary and secondary targets by <color=#86e619>10%</color>

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to reduce Speed Bar of primary and secondary targets by <color=#86e619>15%</color>

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
> Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target to all non-<color=#fff568>MINION</color> <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> and <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies.
> Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on primary target.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked or blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on primary target

1.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the enemy with the highest Damage.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> ally with the most Damage to attack the enemy with the highest Damage.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked or blocked.

1.description:
If Coulson drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar of S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
 > <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
1.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar of S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies and self gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies and self gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies
